simj

Class SimResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • simj.SimResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Caisse, Magasin, Production, Reparation

    public abstract class SimResource
extends Object
    This class implements the generic concept of a resource. The resource is initialized with a name and a number of service channels (capacity). It offers features for managing the arrival, the service, the departure and further management of temporary entities. The concrete service time must be reimplemented.
    Author:
    Patrik Fuhrer

      • uniqueRandomizer

        protected SimRandom uniqueRandomizer

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimResource

        public SimResource(int pCapacity,
           String pResourceName)
        Constructs a resource.
        Parameters:
        pCapacity - The capacity of this resource, that is the maximum number of entities that can be served simultaneously by this resource.
        pResourceName - The name of this resource.

    • Method Detail

      • afterEndService

        protected void afterEndService(SimEntity pEntity)
        Do whatever is appropriate after the end of the service of an entity. By default it does nothing but this is a hook operation and may be overriden by subclasses (for example, "send" the entity to another resource).
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity that has been served by this resource.

      • displayInfoEndService

        protected void displayInfoEndService(SimEntity pEntity)
        Logs default information about the end of service of an entity by this resource. This is a hook operation and may be overridden by subclasses.
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity that has been served by this resource.

      • displayInfoRequest

        protected void displayInfoRequest(SimEntity pEntity)
        Logs default information about an entity requesting this resource. This is a hook operation and may be overridden by subclasses.
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity that is requesting this resource.

      • displayInfoStartService

        protected void displayInfoStartService(SimEntity pEntity)
        Logs default information about the start of service of an entity by this resource. This is a hook operation and may be overridden by subclasses.
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity beginning to be served by this resource.

      • displayInfoStartWaiting

        protected void displayInfoStartWaiting(SimEntity pEntity)
        Logs default information each time an entity starts waiting in front of this resource. This is a hook operation and may be overridden by subclasses.
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity that starts waiting to be served by this resource.

      • endServing

        void endServing(SimEntity pEntity)
        Ends the service of an entity.
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity that is being served by this resource.

      • getCurrentTime

        protected final double getCurrentTime()
        Returns the current time of the simulation. This commoditiy method is useful for subclasses.
        Returns:
        The current time of the simulation.

      • getEndServiceTime

        public double getEndServiceTime(SimEntity pEntity)
        Returns the time at which this resource will relinquish the entity.
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity this resource will serve.
        Returns:
        The time at which the entity will have been finished serving.

      • getNextEntityToServe

        public SimEntity getNextEntityToServe()
        Returns the next entity to serve.
        Returns:
        The next entity to serve.

      • getResourceName

        protected String getResourceName()
        Returns the name of this resource.
        Returns:
        The name of this resource.

      • getServiceTime

        protected abstract double getServiceTime(SimEntity pEntity)
        Returns how much time is needed to serve the entity. This is a primitive operation, and each concrete resource has to implement it appropriately.
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity this resource will serve.
        Returns:
        The duration the entity will spend in this resource.

      • hasEntitiesWaitingToBeServed

        boolean hasEntitiesWaitingToBeServed()
        Tells if there are entities waiting to be served by this resource or not.
        Returns:
        true if there are entities waiting to be served; false otherwise.

      • numberOfEntitiesBeingServed

        public int numberOfEntitiesBeingServed()
        Returns the number of entities being served by this resource.
        Returns:
        The number of entities being served by this resource.

      • numberOfEntitiesWaitingToBeServed

        public int numberOfEntitiesWaitingToBeServed()
        Returns the number of entities waiting to be served by this resource.
        Returns:
        The number of entities waiting to be served by this resource.

      • request

        public void request(SimEntity pEntity)
        Starts "managing" the entity, for which the resource is requested.
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity requesting this resource.

      • startServing

        void startServing(SimEntity pEntity)
        Start serving an entity.
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity this resource is starting to serve.
